I can offer you the following buffs, if you're below Lv. 85. Horn Melody / Drum Melody / Pipe Organ Melody Guitar Melody / Harp Melody / Lute Melody / Prevailing Sonata / Daring Sonata / Refreshing Sonata You can receive the above buffs as a group. For Knight's Harmony / Warrior's Harmony / Wizard's Harmony, you will have to choose one. [scripts_services.SupportMagic:getSupportMagicKnight|"I want the Knight's Harmony."] [scripts_services.SupportMagic:getSupportMagicWarrior|"Warrior's Harmony, please."] [scripts_services.SupportMagic:getSupportMagicWizard|"Wizard's Harmony, of course!"]
